Game.Name: Zombie High (USA) (Proto)
Game.plot: School's out - of control! Just when you though high school couldn't get any weirder, it's zombie-stomping time in the classrooms, hallways, and stairwells. Watch out for the mutant gym teacher!http://www.genesiscollective.com/ShowPage.php?GameLink=1257Cheat: Debug MenuTo access the debug menu, when in-game, on controller two press A + START.
Game.Notes: Zombie High is an unreleased sidescrolling game for the Sega Mega Drive by Electronic Arts. It was cancelled for unknown reasons, but an early prototype has since been dumped. Some of the music in the prototype was used in Cr√ºe Ball.
